subtitle: This delicate tasting stroganoff is delicious served with rice and a little salad.

method.text: Heat the butter and oil in a heatproof dish for 1 min on 100% (FULL) power until butter is melted. Add the onion and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 2 min 30 sec until transparent.

Add a little seasoning to the flour and use to coat the turkey strips. Add to the dish. Cook on 100% (FULL) power for 4-6 min until turkey is no longer pink, stirring the strips and shaking the dish a few times during cooking.
Stir the wine into the dish. Cook on 100% (FULL) power for 4-5 min until turkey is cooked. Transfer the turkey with a slotted spoon to a hot serving dish. Keep warm.
Drain off all but 15 ml of the juices from the dish. Stir in the soured cream. Beat in the mustard. Adjust seasoning. Heat gently on 30% (MEDIUM LOW) power for 4-5 min.
Meanwhile, halve and stone the avocado. Carefully peel and then cut into thin slices. Toss in lemon juice to prevent discoloration.
Stir the turkey and the drained and sliced avocado into the soured cream mixture. Heat gently on 30% (MEDIUM LOW) power for a 2 min. Serve.

title: Turkey and avocado stroganoff - microwave
